CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: PSCs using PffBX-TT:PC71BM as an active layer gave a maximum PCE of 9.10% .

Let's think step by step.

1. PSCs: Polymer Solar Cells
2. PffBX-TT: A specific type of material, likely a polymer or a blend of polymers, used as an active layer in the polymer solar cells.

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are:
1. PSCs
2. PffBX-TT (or PC71BM, as it is mentioned as an active layer material within PSCs)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PffBX-TT (or PC71BM)

This material is the only entity in the paragraph that can be clearly identified as a Material Name. The other entity, PSCs, is a type or category of material, not a specific material name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: PSCs using PffBX-TT:PC71BM as an active layer gave a maximum PCE of 9.10% .

Let's think step by step.

1. PSCs (Passive Solar Collector Systems)
2. PffBX-TT (type of Passive Solar Collector System or a specific model)
3. PC71BM (specific model or type of layer used in the Passive Solar Collector System)
4. PCE (Performance Coefficient of Energy)
5. Maximum (highest value achieved)
6. 9.10% (specific value of PCE)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PC71BM (specific material or layer used in the Passive Solar Collector System)
2. PCE (Performance Coefficient of Energy)
3. 9.10% (specific value of PCE)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PC71BM (specific material or layer used in Passive Solar Collector Systems) |
| PCE (Performance Coefficient of Energy) |
| 9.10% (specific value of PCE) |

Paragraph: PSCs using PffBX-TT:PC71BM as an active layer gave a maximum PCE of 9.10% .

2. PffBX-TT (type of equipment or technology)
3. PC71BM (specific model or identifier of the equipment or layer)
4. Maximum (property of the PCE)
5. PCE (Power Consumption Efficiency)
6. 9.10% (value of the PCE)
